name: Happy BBQ 2 - new casual puzzle game
name_original: Happy BBQ 2 - new casual puzzle game
description:
◆Happy BBQ, the world's most popular casual puzzle game last year!At the request of players,Happy BBQ 2 is coming!Thank you very much, every player!We will continue to work hard in the future to update the game.

—————————Features—————————
【New gameplay】
O(∩_∩)O the player roast food more easily and more interesting!

【New challenge】
(^ ▽ ^) In the game,we will record the highest score of the player,so challenge yourself to try something new.

【New rank】
(＝^ω^＝) Game Center support.The top 10 of the player's name will be displayed real time in the game.Who is the most powerful player?

【More】
＼( ^▽^ )／ And..... more to come!

—————————Feedback—————————
◆We'd love to get your feedback.
◆E-mail:crabsoft@hotmail.com
◆Twitter:@Crabsoft

Good luck!Have fun!(○^～^○)
